headline: Prudential Executive Chairman Lowrey to Step Down as CEO; Sullivan Named Successor
summary: Andrew Sullivan, head of international businesses and global investment management, will succeed him.

headline: Prudential Financial names insider Andrew Sullivan as CEO
summary: Prudential Financial on Tuesday named insider Andrew Sullivan as its CEO, succeeding Charles Lowrey. The company said Lowrey will remain as executive chairman of the board for 18 months.

raw.headline: Prudential Financial names insider Andrew Sullivan as CEO
raw.summary: Prudential Financial on Tuesday named insider Andrew Sullivan as its CEO, succeeding Charles Lowrey. The company said Lowrey will remain as executive chairman of the board for 18 months.

headline: Prudential Financial Board of Directors Elects Andrew Sullivan as Next CEO
summary: NEWARK, N.J., December 03, 2024--Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) today announced that the Board of Directors has appointed Andrew Sullivan as its next CEO, effective March 31, 2025. Sullivan, who currently serves as executive vice president and head of International Businesses and Global Investment Management, will succeed Charles F. Lowrey. Lowrey will remain as Executive Chairman of the Board for 18 months, working with the Board and supporting and advising Sullivan.

Lowrey will remain as Executive Chairman of the Board for 18 months, working with the Board and supporting and advising Sullivan.
